mapper.select: select partner_no from partner_domain where domain_name like concat('%',#{domainName},'%') limit 1

select t3.tenant_no , t3.partner_no , t3.parent_partner_no , t4.partner_domain_no from users t1 inner join user_partner t2 on t1.user_no = t2.user_no inner join partner t3 on t2.partner_no = t3.partner_no left outer join partner_domain t4 on t3.partner_no = t4.partner_no where t1.user_no = #{userNo} limit 1
